# Visit

Find everything you need to plan your visit to the Trout Museum of Art. [Members](http://web.archive.org/web/20240616091249/https://troutmuseum.org/become-a-member/) receive free access to [exhibits](http://web.archive.org/web/20240616091249/https://troutmuseum.org/view/) for one full year. We’re excited for you to come experience art with us.

**Store and Gallery Hours**

Tues, Wed | 10am-4pm  
Thurs, Fri | 10am-7pm  
Sat | 10am-5pm  
Sun | 12pm-4pm  
Mon | Closed

_Closed Christmas Eve and Day_ _, New Year’s Eve and_ _Day, Easter, Fourth of July, Thanksgiving, and during Art_ _at the Park (Jul 27 & 28, 2024). __Galleries closed during exhibit changeover. TMA Store is open during_ _ exhibit changeover._

## Membership & Admission

TMA is membership based. Pay as little as $15 to become a member for a full year and gain free access to exhibits. Membership also includes 10% off educational classes and camps and in the Museum Store.

TMA also has one-day or out-of-town visitor options, see below.

Visiting as a school group? See [TMA Group Tours.](http://web.archive.org/web/20240616091249/https://troutmuseum.org/tma-group-tours/)

Membership & Admission Cost

**Memberships  
** Free Admission and discounts for a year!
